Name: Apple & Blackberry Spritz
Ingredients: 20 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass .
Prepare garnish of blackberry and apple wedge.
POUR first 3 ingredients into glass and briefly stir.
Garnish with blackberry and apple wedge.
Review: The name aptly describes the drink.
History: Created in 2013 by yours truly for Jamie's Italian Bars. See Spritz cocktail history and more recipes
Nutrition: One serving of Apple & Blackberry Spritz contains 156 calories
